Articles.Content:
Loaded a game on the surface on Mun. After planting a flag with Bob WASD controls do not work until I use jetpack. F and B on the ladder und for bording do not work, too.

KSP Version 0.1.2.0.22258

Win 10

Ryzen 7 5800X, RTX 3070ti, 32GB

Edited June 1, 2023 by Anth12

I have the same problem. A quicksave/reload fixed the WASD problem, but still cannot grab ladders or enter pods. the F and B keys seem to not work. It started just after landing on the moon and using the F2 mode to take a screenshot.

i9 10900k, RTX3080, 64GB RAM
